price: (43) [Due to] arrogance in the land and plotting of evil; but the evil plot does not encompass except its own people. Then do they await except the way [i.e., fate] of the former peoples? But you will never find in the way [i.e., established method] of Allāh any change, and you will never find in the way of Allāh[1257] any alteration.[1258]
arabic: ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَكۡرَ ٱلسَّيِّيِٕۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ ٱلسَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهۡلِهِۦۚ فَهَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗاۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَحۡوِيلًا
footnotes:
[1257]- i.e., in His punishment of those who deny the prophets.
[1258]- Or "transfer" of punishment to others in place of them.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: is'tik'bāran fī al-arḍi wamakra al-sayi-i walā yaḥīqu al-makru al-sayi-u illā bi-ahlihi fahal yanẓurūna illā sunnata al-awalīna falan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi taḥwīlan
